Posts.Content: Jun 6, 2017 10:34PM Lissee wrote: hi, I never wrapped and only used a reduction kit. My work (in healthcare) is too demanding and this made the best sense for me. It's a bit tricky too get right, but once you do, you definitely see results. I Also, I used it approx 6-8 hours a day and then put on a compression garment. I also use cold compression for my hand/wrist, which swelled the most. Good lucküëç
